description:
Souta recommends the Quest Dorm enters the Miss Hatagaya Academy Beauty Contest. Nanami gives a speech to cheer up Souta, and wins a festival pass which makes everything free as long as she is with Souta. They meet a girl who is running from something.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hold This for Me. The Winner of the Beauty Contest Is Written Here.
Je te confie ça. À l`intérieur, le nom de la gagnante du concours de miss
Koitsu o Azukatte Oite Kure. Miss-Con no Yuushousha no Namae ga Kakarete Irunda
أمسك هذا من أجلي رجاءً، اسم الفائزة في مسابقة الجمال مكتوب هنا
こいつを預かっておいてくれ. ミスコンの優勝者の名前が書かれているんだ
